^(attestationState)$.description: We do not want to validate its content since it might depend on the client-side schema

^(baseDigest)$.description:
digest of the attestation state this update was performed on top of
 The digest might be empty the first time

attestation_state.description: We do not want to validate its content since it might depend on the client-side schema

base_digest.description:
digest of the attestation state this update was performed on top of
 The digest might be empty the first time
